TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ForeignKeyConstraint extends System.Data.Constraint

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.ForeignKeyConstraintEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Represents an action restriction enforced on a set of columns in a primary key/foreign key relationship when a value or row is either deleted or updated.

span.span: Represents an action restriction enforced on a set of columns in a primary key/foreign key relationship when a value or row is either deleted or updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A限制資料行 （或資料行） 中的值已刪除或更新時執行的動作。A restricts the action performed when a value in a column (or columns) is either deleted or updated. 這類條件約束被用來搭配主索引鍵資料行。Such a constraint is intended to be used with primary key columns. 在兩個資料表之間的父子式關聯性，從父資料表中刪除某個值可能會影響子資料列以下列方式之一。In a parent/child relationship between two tables, deleting a value from the parent table can affect the child rows in one of the following ways. - 子資料列也可以刪除 （串聯式動作）。The child rows can also be deleted (a cascading action). - 子資料行 （或資料行） 中的值可以設為 null 值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to null values. - 子資料行 （或資料行） 中的值可以設定為預設值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to default values. - 可以產生例外狀況。An exception can be generated. 物件包含在的，這透過存取屬性。 objects are contained in the of a , which is accessed through the property. 條件約束不會強制執行除非屬性設定為`true`。Constraints are not enforced unless the property is set to `true`. 強制執行每當物件的叫用方法。The is enforced whenever a object's method is invoked. ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 設定某些屬性，並將它加入至物件的。The following example creates a , sets some of its properties, and adds it to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型是安全多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更或不是等到最後`AcceptChanges`叫用方法。Changes to a or are not final until the `AcceptChanges` method is invoked. 此時，決定任何的採取值的變更或刪除動作。At that point, the determines the course of action on any values that have been changed or deleted. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，設定其，並將條件約束物件的。The following example creates a , sets its , and adds the constraint to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the action that occurs across this constraint when a row is deleted.

span.span: Gets or sets the action that occurs across this constraint when a row is deleted.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從父資料表中，刪除資料列決定子資料表 （或資料表） 的資料行中會發生什麼事。When a row is deleted from a parent table, the determines what will happen in the columns of the child table (or tables). 如果規則設定為`Cascade`，將會刪除子資料列。If the rule is set to `Cascade`, child rows will be deleted. 如果設定為`SetNull`、`DBnull`將放置在適當的資料行的受影響的資料列。If set to `SetNull`, a `DBnull` will be placed in the appropriate columns of the affected rows. 根據資料來源時，null 值可能或可能不會允許資料行中。Depending on your data source, a null value may or may not be permitted in a column. 例如，sql Server 可讓在主索引鍵資料行中找到多個 null 值即使不是唯一。For example, SQLServer allows multiple null values to be found in a primary key column, even if they are not unique. 在，不過，如果物件的屬性設定為`true`，主索引鍵資料行中不允許多個 null 值。In a , however, if a object's property is set to `true`, multiple null values are not allowed in primary key columns. 如果設定為`SetDefault`，指派資料行的預設值。If set to `SetDefault`, the default value for the column is assigned. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 ForeignKeyConstraint、 設定各種屬性，並將它加入至物件的。The following example creates a ForeignKeyConstraint, sets various of its properties, and adds it to a object's . [!code-vb[Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ForeignKeyConstraint.DeleteRule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
